description: DBGL is an open-source, free, multi-platform Java frontend for DOSBox, based largely upon the proven interface of D-Fend. It tries to make creating DOSBox configuration files a little easier by offering a simple interface, some shortcuts and a little bit of intelligence. Once your DOS games are configured in DBGL, its very easy to setup or start them, or alter their configuration or associated DOSBox version.
author: Ronald Blankendaal
